name: Age of Cavemen
description: Build a strong village, train a huge army and explore paleo-lithic world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: What's this game doing on Steam? Get back to AppStore, or Google Play.   Played it for about 15 minutes - poor mobile port, pay2play, nothing to do if you don't want to give money to developer. Just like in 60% of the same, copy pasted mobile games. Good thing - you can delete it from your account using  help.steampowered.com

I played long enough that it would let me leave a review... and in that time (about 10 minutes) I was asked to buy items 5 times, highlighted to me that I could do it faster with more builders (cost), the same had to restart, the tutorial bugged out and it wanted me to waste my life watching advertising for pay.   100% do not need this crap on steam, don't let steam reach to this level pls. It's a horrible horrible money grab clone of clash of clans that wouldnt make it in the real world of mobile gaming and somehow made it to steam.... I don't know how. Write to your local politician because this is the real issue.

Cons: Pretty much an exact copy of clash of clans (not really a bad thing) Clearly meant to be a mobile game due to long waiting times  Long waiting times im talking up to hours maybe weeks i dident get that far Pay to win (fair enough its free they have to make money but why do you have to make it pay to win) If you have a full storage and you battle after the battle the game will crash. Pros: Kind of cool concept (even though its copied from clash of clans) Nice Gameplay if it wasent such a long wait to get to the battle  Overall the game would be fun as a mobile game because all you do is click a few buttons and put the game down for a few hours while it builds your units or constructs a new part of your base. So i give this game a 4/10 mainly because it is on the wrong platform.
Horrible Pay To Win. Not need this in Steam.
This is some booty a$$ trail mix right here -14.6/10 would get cancer again

This game is a complete clash of clans ripoff, but no problem, they at least changed the theme/graphics, decided to try.  The game is pay to win to the extreme, it's designed in a way that if you have infinite irl money you can cap the game in a second, because everything, from resources to building stuff instantly, can be bought with real money. It doesn't matter how good you are, the top rankers will be the guys who pay a lot, if you want to climb on the highscores, don't even bother devoting your time to this game, unless you're also willing to devote your wallet, credit card etc.  Well... At least it's fun building things and attacking people... Until you get to a higher level when things start taking ages to build, several days, even weeks, you can barely play, you can easily cap on resources by attacking, but it's futile because you can't spend then, unless you're willing to pay real money to make things build instantly.  Despite all this, I still kept playing, just had to login once in a while to build stuff and make some attacks. I also receive attacks from other players, of course, but the game gives you an option to avenge the attack, it is, attack who attacked you, great!  Here comes the reason I stopped playing: the bugs.  I used the revenge option 3 times over a week (you're only allowed to avenge attacks that destroy a certain percentage of your village), saw the enemy village, planned the attack, made the exactly right units for it and attacked! Aced every attack (100% destruction), it's really satisfying, crushed the ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥, stole my resources back and got my trophies back!   Well... Not so really... ON EVERY REVENGE ATTACK THE GAME BUGGED AFTER, and I had The game ♥♥♥♥ing removed the revenge option! It was like a slap on my face, not once, BUT THIS ♥♥♥♥ HAPPENED 3 TIMES!   Tl;dr Play only if you're willing to spend money and put up with bugs that throw your effort out a window.

Clash of clans rip-off much this game is slow it takes a day to get 100 meat when you are starting off and meat is the in-game money so it is like your waiting to build or upgrade one little thing dont waste space on your computer for these peice of garbage

This game would be really good IF it worked without any bugs and the developers actually fixed the game instead of adding more bugs to the game when they apparently try to fix it  The bad points of game apart from the bugs is the fact that the troop training times is so long that You fall asleep waiting fo them or only get to attack once or twice a day IF Your lucky  They done it like that trying to be greedy and making players spend a small fortune on game to speed up troop production  I would NOT recommend anyone spending any money on this game it is NOT worth it and You may as well throw your money down the nearest drain Because that is what You will be doing even more so when you just spend money on game and the log in and find out that You cant for a month or two like has happened to some players already   It really would be a really good social game IF they actually fixed it
Good game but there are a few things I sont like about it

Free and very nice :) strategic because of the attacks you can plan to increase honor and get resources and also because you can plan the timing of work for the builder's hut, it's also a puzzle when you decide to move your village around ;-) so even if you have to wait for your troopers to be ready or a worker to be avaliable you can still have fun
Best game i have ever played best story it's just a master Cheif of a game mmmmm i ♥♥♥ when i think of this game and it's only free what a great buy must get      i rate 9/11 would bomb again
Это как Clash of Clans, только Age of Cavemen.
Rawr!!! This game needs Steam Cards. Then more people will play it on Steam.

This game should go back to the stone age.  Review: Game gets boring after a while, and the game is P2W. the game is okay for like couple hours, or just an hour, but it gets old. Pros:  *People play it *lasts a little while *kinda fun Cons: p2w p2w p2w p2w p2w p2w p2w p2w p2w graphics are okay....sound is ok gameplay is ok  Rating: P2W
